overview: Batool initially joined Acumen Fund in the Pakistan office as a Knowledge and Communications Consultant working on various insight pieces and knowledge sharing initiatives around the Pakistan investments. She is now working as the Pakistan Business Development Associate managing fundraising and communications initiatives. Prior to joining Acumen Fund in Pakistan, she worked in the US in the consumer banking sector and has experience consulting in microfinance. Batool holds a Masters of International Affairs in Economic Development from the School of International Affairs, Columbia University.
